| History                 = The '''Cyber-Ninjas''' were sent by the [[Wilson Fisk (Earth-616)|Kingpin]] to intercept the [[X-Men (Earth-616)|X-Men]] whom were in Hong Kong to prevent anyone from getting [[Zheng Zu (Earth-616)|Fu Manchu]]'s immortality Elixir Vitae. They fought [[Shang-Chi (Earth-616)|Shang-Chi]] and the X-Men, but were defeated in battle.{{r|X-Men Vol 2 62|63}}

Along with 14 other terrorist organizations, the Cyber-Ninjas later targeted the Taskmaster to collect the billion-dollar bounty that was put on his head. They were slain along with the other bounty hunters when making the attempt on the bounty.{{r|Taskmaster Vol 2 1}}

The Cyber-Ninjas then joined the "[[Minions' International Liberation Front (Earth-616)|Minions' International Liberation Front]]" (MILF) and once again went after the Taskmaster who was at an abandoned [[Strategic Homeland Intervention, Enforcement and Logistics Division (Earth-616)|S.H.I.E.L.D.]] base. All of the attackers were either killed or were forced to flee.{{r|Taskmaster Vol 2 3|4}}
